MarkdownCodeBlock.code_block: val file = sc.textFile("/example/data/gutenberg/davinci.txt") val counts = file.flatMap(line => line.split(" ")).map(word => (word, 1)).reduceByKey(_ + _) counts.toArray().foreach(println)
